Sentencas: The catalytic activity of nickel-containing composites based on scandium- and cerium-stabilized zirconia (10Sc1CeSZ) was studied in the steam reforming of butane (SRB).
Titulo: Effect of the Composition of Nickel-Containing Composites Based on Scandium- and Ceriumstabilized Zirconia on Their Catalytic Properties in the Steam Reforming of Butane

Sentencas: Doping of the nickel composite with 0.1 wt.% platinum leads to a decrease in the temperatures required to reach 10%-90% conversion by 60-100 A degrees C. Modification of a bimetallic nickel-copper catalyst with cerium dioxide leads to high activity in SRB in the temperature range 600-800 A degrees C characteristic for solid oxide fuel cells operating on hydrocarbon fuel.
Titulo: Effect of the Composition of Nickel-Containing Composites Based on Scandium- and Ceriumstabilized Zirconia on Their Catalytic Properties in the Steam Reforming of Butane
